p: In this study, the occurrence points of Psa were obtained from field data collected by the authors in the Chinese provinces of Sichuan and Shaanxi, from the published literature, and from the online databases GBIF and EPPO ( S1 Table). When coordinates were published, we used the records directly. If there were only localities, Google Earth was used to collect coordinates of the records. All occurrence records were checked for accuracy in ArcGIS prior to use. Records with obvious geocoding errors were discarded, and duplicate records were removed manually. All records were imported into Microsoft Excel and saved as “*.CSV” format.
